```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(sp)
library(raster)
library(rgdal)
library(dismo)
library(envirem)

```

```{r}
## read in a climatic raster for use as a template
rasterTemplate <- raster('D:/Downloads_bak/Climond2/wc2.1_2.5m_clip_CanESM5_ssp245_2081-2100/wc2.1_2.5m_CanESM5_ssp245_2081-2100_tmax_clip_01.tif')

## calculate monthly solar radiation, defined for the year 2030, output to the current directory
ETsolradRasters(rasterTemplate = rasterTemplate, year = 140, 
                outputDir = 'D:/Downloads_bak/Climond2/wc2.1_2.5m_clip_CanESM5_ssp245_2081-2100/', overwrite = TRUE)
```

```{r}
wcFiles <- list.files('D:/Downloads_bak/Climond2/wc2.1_2.5m_clip_CanESM5_ssp245_2081-2100/', pattern = 'wc2.1_2.5m', full.names = TRUE)
wcStack <- stack(wcFiles)
names(wcStack)
#str(wcStack)

solarFiles <- list.files('D:/Downloads_bak/Climond2/wc2.1_2.5m_clip_CanESM5_ssp245_2081-2100/', pattern = 'et_solrad', full.names = TRUE)
solarStack <- stack(solarFiles)
```


```{r}
## note that "-" symbol in names is replaced by "."
assignNames(tmax = "wc2.1_2.5m_CanESM5_ssp245_2081.2100_tmax_clip_##",
            tmin = "wc2.1_2.5m_CanESM5_ssp245_2081.2100_tmin_clip_##",
            precip = "wc2.1_2.5m_CanESM5_ssp245_2081.2100_prec_clip_##",
            solrad = "et_solrad_##"
            )

varnames()
verifyFileStructure('D:/Downloads_bak/Climond2/wc2.1_2.5m_clip_CanESM5_ssp245_2081-2100/', returnFileNames = FALSE)

# We can verify that variable names will be correctly recognized.
verifyRasterNames(masterstack = wcStack, solradstack = solarStack)
```

```{r}

env_rasters <- layerCreation(masterstack = wcStack, solradstack = solarStack, var = 'all')
plot(env_rasters)

writeRaster(env_rasters, filename = "future_stack_envirem16_CanESM5_ssp245_2081-2100.tif", datatype = "FLT4S",format = "GTiff", overwrite = TRUE) 

```
